question: A, B and C can complete a piece of work in 12, 24 and 36 days respectively. In how many days will they together complete the same work?
explanation:
(A + B + C)\'s 1 day\'s work $latex = \\frac{1}{12}+\\frac{1}{24}+\\frac{1}{36}&s=1$
$latex = \\frac{6+3+2}{72} = \\frac{11}{72}&s=1$
âˆ´ (A + B + C) together will complete the work in $latex \\frac{72}{11}= 6\\frac{6}{11}\\ days&s=1$
Hence option [D] is correct answer.<
